Uses of Package
org.netbeans.jellytools

  • Packages that use org.netbeans.jellytools 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.jellytools  
    org.netbeans.jellytools.actions  
    org.netbeans.jellytools.nodes  
    org.netbeans.jellytools.properties
    Provides a set of classes for setting properties.
    org.netbeans.jellytools.properties.editors
    Provides a set of classes for setting properties by custom editors.
    org.netbeans.jellytools.util
    Contains utility classes handy for test developers.
    org.netbeans.jellytools.widgets  
  • Classes in org.netbeans.jellytools used by org.netbeans.jellytools 
    Class and Description
    FavoritesOperator
    Operator handling Favorites TopComponent.
    HelpOperator
    Class implementing all necessary methods for handling "Help" Frame.
    MainWindowOperator
    Handle NetBeans main window.
    MainWindowOperator.StatusTextTracer
    Class to trace messages printed to status bar of the Main Window.
    NbDialogOperator
    Handle generic NetBeans dialog.
    OptionsOperator
    Provides access to the Options window and it's subcomponents.
    OutputOperator
    Provides access to the Output window and it's subcomponents.
    OutputTabOperator
    Operator for Output tab.
    PluginsOperator
    Handle Plugins dialog which is opened from main menu "Tools|Plugins".
    SaveAsTemplateOperator
    Handle "Save As Template" dialog.
    TopComponentOperator
    Represents org.openide.windows.TopComponent.
    TreeTableOperator
    Handle IDE's org.openide.explorer.view.TreeTable component which is used instead of JTree in Options dialog, ...
    WizardOperator
    Enable to manipulate NetBeans wizards.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.jellytools used by org.netbeans.jellytools.actions
